name: ZK User Interface File
summary: Learn about .ZUL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: ZUL files are used to create rich Web-based user interfaces. Their contents are first parsed on a Java-based Web server, such as Apache Tomcat, and then sent to the requesting client Web browser.
Conceptually, ZUL files are similar to .JSP files.

description: A file with .zul extension is a web file created with the User Interface Markup Language (ZUML) and contains definitions for user interface elements. Ajax and Java classes support using the XML-based ZUML for developing server side files. ZUL file format was developed by ZK, a UI framework that enables you to build web and mobile applications without the knowledge of JavaScript or AJAX.

Web file created in the ZK User Interface Markup Language (ZUML), an XML-based language supported by Ajax technology and Java classes; contains definitions for user interface elements as well as zscript code.
